item.title: Tools
item.description:
The flash animations were developed by Jean-Michel Claus (with voiceover by Gilbert Strang). We are grateful! Funding was provided by a grant from the The d’Arbeloff Fund for Excellence in MIT Education as part of The d’Arbeloff Interactive Mathematics Project (d’A I M P).

Matrix Multiplication

An interactive demo (with voiceover explanation) on Matrix Multiplication, A = LU, and PA = LU

Eigenvalue Demonstrations

The demonstrations below employ JavaÂ® applets with voice-over narration to show some Eigenvalue concepts.
